hero.subtitle: I help teams move from ideas to clear, usable and dev-ready interfaces by combining UX, Frontend and project coordination.
hero.profileExperience: Experience in Frontend, UI/UX, and Project Coordination.

highlights.domains: Experience in fintech, public sector and analytics dashboards
highlights.stack: Stack: React, TypeScript, Tailwind, Figma, Jira, etc.

about.title: From Frontend to experience design and project coordination
about.subtitle: My background combines development, user experience and project management, allowing me to support projects end-to-end: from understanding the problem to delivering production-ready solutions.
about.body1: I am a Systems Engineer with a specialization in Information Systems. I started my career in Frontend development (JavaScript, React, TailwindCSS) and over time evolved into UI/UX design, creating clear, consistent interfaces aligned with business needs.
about.body2: I currently work as a Project Coordinator and Web Design Analyst. I coordinate development teams, organize high-level roadmaps and communicate progress and risks to stakeholders in a clear, actionable way.
about.body3: I enjoy building bridges between business, design and technology: translating requirements into user stories, designing flows and screens, and supporting implementation to ensure the final experience delivers what was promised.
about.skillsUx: UX & UI: Figma, wireframes, interactive prototypes, user testing, design systems.
about.skillsFrontend: Frontend: React, TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, TailwindCSS, REST APIs.
about.skillsManagement: Management: project coordination, high-level planning, user story tracking, stakeholder communication.

portfolio.title: Selected case studies
portfolio.subtitle: Browse interactive prototypes directly from Figma. Use the arrows to move between case studies.

fincrime.name: FinCrime Dynamics â€“ Fraud prevention dashboards
fincrime.description: Design and implementation of interfaces for financial analysis dashboards, focusing on visual clarity, information hierarchy and brand consistency.
fincrime.impact: Improved understanding of critical fraud metrics and reduced friction when navigating between key views.

treasury.name: Treasury platforms â€“ Public sector
treasury.description: Information architecture and screen design for collection, treasury and reporting modules, aligning regulatory requirements with a clear experience for internal users.
treasury.impact: Greater visibility of cash flow and fewer ambiguities in critical process forms.

citizen360.name: Citizen 360 â€“ Citizen service experience
citizen360.description: Flow design, interface screens and usability testing to improve how citizens interact with public administration digital services.
citizen360.impact: Better understanding of process steps and fewer unnecessary steps in navigation.

experience.title: Professional journey
experience.subtitle: A summarized view of my most relevant roles, aligned with the CV.

fincrime.b1: Worked with the engineering team to implement interfaces and solve code issues.
fincrime.b2: Designed and evaluated user interfaces aligned with client requirements.
fincrime.b3: Prepared progress reports and technical specifications for stakeholders.

soporte.b2: Prepared operational reports and supported service continuity.

tass_web.b1: Designed information architectures (sitemaps, flows) for multiple projects.
tass_web.b2: Created high-fidelity prototypes in Figma for web, dashboards and applications.
tass_web.b3: Supported development teams to ensure correct implementation of designs.

tass_pm.b1: Coordinated development teams across a portfolio of ~16 projects.
tass_pm.b2: Built high-level roadmaps, tracked progress and managed risks.
tass_pm.b3: Presented progress to clients, handled feedback and prioritized requirements.

cv.summaryBody: Systems Engineer and Information Systems specialist with experience across the lifecycle of technology projects. I combine Frontend development (JavaScript, React, TypeScript) with user experience design (UI/UX) and project coordination. I enjoy guiding teams towards clear deliveries aligned with business goals and user experience.
